abstract: Supreme Court is scheduled to hear arguments regarding challenge to Texas abortion law, which requires abortion doctors to secure admitting privileges at local hospitals and limits abortion to ambulatory surgical centers, in what is described as landmark case that could shape abortion laws for years; key to case is meaning of language in ruling on Planned Parenthood v Casey in 1992, which asserted that states cannot impose undue burden on access to abortion.

headline.print_headline: Supreme Court Abortion Case Seen as Turning Point for Clinics
headline.main: Supreme Court Abortion Case Seen as a Turning Point for Clinics

snippet: The future of many clinics, across much of the country, could be at stake this spring as the Supreme Court takes up what both sides in the debate describe as a landmark issue.
lead_paragraph: The future of many clinics, across much of the country, could be at stake this spring as the Supreme Court takes up what both sides in the debate describe as a landmark issue.
